: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw: I didn't mean to startle you. It was getting boring in there, so I thought I'd come talk to you. Explain this plan, destruction of Maximals is good, but what's the sacrifice.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:
KitKat::

She spun around and looked at SharpClaw. "Don't sneek up on me 
again!" she growled at him. She realized he was one of her team and 
calmed down. "Look, I have a plan to get rid of the maximals. A small 
sacrifice will be made, but it will be worth it."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw had been silently listening to all that was said, and was 
growing bored. He found his way from the control room, to the 
outside. He saw KitKat, and came up next to the femme.
> SharpClaw: What are you writeing?
